Career Highlights

Welcome to a curated journey through some of the professional experiences, leadership roles, and innovation challenges I have been a part of!

🎤 Guest Talk at Matrusri Engineering College

On September 15, 2023, I had the incredible opportunity to address over 600 budding engineers at Matrusri Engineering College’s induction program.
I spoke about: - The multifaceted world of engineering - Mental health and emotional intelligence - The power of mindfulness in boosting creativity and decision-making

A truly memorable experience inspiring the next generation of engineers!

🔗 View on LinkedIn

🚀 Joining GW Google Developer Student Club

In October 2024, I started my new role as a Digital Marketing Officer at the Google Developer Student Club (GDSC) at GWU.
Here, I work to promote events, expand student outreach, and foster a culture of innovation and collaboration among aspiring developers at GWU.

🔗 View on LinkedIn

💼 Appointed Financial Officer at GW Desis Graduate Club

Also in October 2024, I took charge as the Financial Officer of the GW Desis Graduate Student Organization.
In this role, I manage budgets, facilitate event planning, and support the vibrant South Asian student community on campus.

🔗 View on LinkedIn

🎓 Career Growth Webinar with Ravi Ganti

On February 20, 2024, I helped organize a transformative webinar featuring insights from Ravi Ganti on career growth.
Key takeaways: - Build a career around what excites you. - Adopt a growth mindset and adaptability. - Leverage AI tools as powerful allies for productivity, not as competition.

A truly inspiring session that reshaped how I think about professional growth!

🔗 View on LinkedIn

🏥 Building MOM (My Own Medic) at George Hacks 2025

During the George Hacks Hackathon on March 2, 2025, our team built MOM (My Own Medic) — a personalized AI healthcare assistant that integrates securely with Electronic Health Records (EHRs) for real-time, proactive health insights.

Tech Stack:
TensorFlow • GPT-4 • FastAPI • MongoDB • React.js • FHIR APIs • OAuth 2.0

It was an amazing learning experience working on HIPAA-compliant AI applications!

🔗 View on LinkedIn

🧪 Research Showcase at GW SEAS R&D Fair

On April 25, 2025, I presented two co-authored research projects at the GW SEAS R&D Showcase: - Navigating Nitrogen: Analyzing Chesapeake Bay’s agricultural trade pathways. - Resilient Megacities: Adaptive strategies for urban resilience in a changing climate.

A fantastic opportunity to share our team’s work with a broader academic audience!

🔗 View on LinkedIn
